scenes.action_text: AIR by Alex Convery GRANDVIEW / Zac Frognowski / Faisal Kanaan UTA / Ramses IsHak / Michael Sheresky / Jordan Lonner ii. INSERT - TV COMMERCIAL The unmistakable smile of MAGIC JOHNSON - he's holding a CONVERSE SNEAKER and rapping along to a cheesy jingle. MAGIC JOHNSON The Converse Weapon - that's the shoe that let Magic do what he was born to do! ISAIH THOMAS. ISAIH THOMAS
